C

canRedo() - Method in class imageeditor.EditorStateModel
Returns true if there is some action to redo, false otherwise.
canUndo() - Method in class imageeditor.EditorStateModel
Returns true if there is some action to undo, false otherwise.
CharacterBrush - Class in imageeditor
This implementation of the AsciiBrush interface draws a line by writing a specific character at each point of the line, with the active background and foreground color of the painter that is used to draw.
CharacterBrush(char) - Constructor for class imageeditor.CharacterBrush
Initializes an istance of the character brush that draws a line using the given character.
characterSelected(char) - Method in interface imageeditor.EditorListener
Called when a new character is selected by the user.
characterSelected(char) - Method in class imageeditor.ImageEditor
Called when a new character is selected by the user.
CharacterSelectorDialog - Class in imageeditor
Displays the ASCII character grid and allows you to select one
CharacterSelectorDialog(Frame, EditorListener, EditorStateModel) - Constructor for class imageeditor.CharacterSelectorDialog
Initializes an instance of the character selector dialog
clear() - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiPainter
Clear the entire surface to whatever the default background color is.
clear(char) - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiPainter
Clear the entire surface with the specified character and whatever the default foreground and background colors are.
clone() - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiRaster
Creates a deep copy of the raster, whose character and color arrays are independent from the original ones.
close() - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiRasterReader
Closes the underlying file
close() - Method in class asciipanel.AsciiRasterWriter
Closes the underlying file
convert4(BufferedImage) - Static method in class imageeditor.ImageConverter
Converts the source image to 4-bit colour using the default 16-colour palette: BLACK dark RED dark GREEN dark YELLOW dark BLUE dark MAGENTA dark CYAN dark grey light grey RED GREEN YELLOW BLUE MAGENTA CYAN WHITE No transparency.
convert4(BufferedImage, int[]) - Static method in class imageeditor.ImageConverter
Converts the source image to 4-bit colour using the given colour map.
convertTo(AsciiRaster, BufferedImage) - Method in class imageeditor.ImageConverter
Converts the given image to ASCII art and writes the result to the given raster.
